name: Pandora's Rising
description:
Pandora’s husband, Epimetheus, has been put under a mighty curse. To create the cure, she have to use her own vitality. In order to save her beloved one, Pandora will explore the Tower, the holy home of Gaïa, the mother goddess, seeking to strengthen her vitality by killing Primordial Spirits. But is taking down aspects of nature really the right thing to do ?
Team:

Bastien Lapouille: Graphic design; Game design Loïc Dubois C.: Writing; Level design; Graphic design
